Package com.konakart.kktags

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseTag
    Base tag containing tag utilities
    CarouselTag
    Tag used to write out a carousel with products in it
    LinkTag
    Tag used to create a link.
    MsgTag
    Tag used to retrieve a message from the message catalog
    PageSizeTag
    Tag used to write out a drop list to select number of items to view on page
    PagingTag
    Tag used to write out a page navigation widget
    ProdOptionTag
    Tag used to format product options depending on the type
    ProdTileTag
    Tag used to write out a product tile
    ReviewOrderByTag
    Tag used to write out a drop list for sorting reviews
    VendorReviewOrderByTag
    Tag used to write out a drop list for sorting reviews
    VerticalCarouselTag
    Tag used to write out a carousel with products in it
